page.title: 10 Long Bennington
page.content: {Mr.Dawson}was born in 1905 and has lived in the village all his life. His grandfather came to the village in 1850 and the family have been builders since then.They have been responsible for much of the building work in the surrounding villages within a 15 mile radius. He remembers electricity coming to the village in 1934 and mains water after the 1st World War. The village was dependant on wells and river water before this. In{1985 Long Bennington}is much sought after as a residential village, because it has many amenities including ; a new school, a doctor's surgery, shops, garages, hairdresser, hotel, 3 public houses and a village hall. There are also old people's bungalows and warden controlled flats. There are plans for future residential development south of the school.
